<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_script_operation"><sys_rte_eb_script_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><conditional_fields/><conditional_script><![CDATA[/* Example Script
(function(batch, output) {
    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here
        // based on the input variables assign variable 'b' to true or false.
        var b = true; // or false;

        // step3: set the output for each element
        output[i] = b;
    }
})(batch, output);
*/
(function(batch, output) {
    // add your code here
    
})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><name>Script Operation - u_port_alias1</name><operation_group/><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
   for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
      var input = batch[i].input; // Value of the input columns concatenated with '|'.
      if (batch[i].u_port_alias1 && batch[i].u_port_alias2) {
         output[i]=batch[i].u_port_alias1 + ',' + batch[i].u_port_alias2;
      } else if (batch[i].u_port_alias1 ) {
         output[i]=batch[i].u_port_alias1 ;
      } else if (batch[i].u_port_alias2) {
         output[i]=batch[i].u_port_alias2 ;
      }
   }
})(batch, output);]]></script><source_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_port_alias1">b2e8599b1b7dce90269e97d2b24bcbc7</source_sys_rte_eb_field><source_sys_rte_eb_fields/><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-01 13:14:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>edead5d71bbdce90269e97d2b24bcbf8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Script Operation - u_port_alias1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO" source="x_snc_exfo_cmdb">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="SG-EXFO Logical Port Children">98e8d55b1b7dce90269e97d2b24bcbab</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">b2e8d59b1b7dce90269e97d2b24bcb70</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation_edead5d71bbdce90269e97d2b24bcbf8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 13:14:57</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="distinguished_name">e5ead5d71bbdce90269e97d2b24bcbf6</target_sys_rte_eb_field><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Script Operation">941f88e273b333002b6265a751ab9e84</type><use_unique_input_sets>true</use_unique_input_sets></sys_rte_eb_script_operation></record_update>
